body: Sex toys is too general, it deserves more breakdowns as other tags does, there are new tags added just too apperciate some authors being creative, which is hugely unfair
Should sex toys be added as a tag as well?
Geez, it's a good fap and all, but man if only I knew what they were saying; oh well.
KING CRIMSON i know, this guy draws all my favorite girls, shiki, nozomi, carmilla, raikou. I

CAN SOMEONE ALREADY TRANSLATE ALL OF BUKATSU'S HENTAI ALREADY? LIKE, THERE'RE 6 DOUJINS OF HIS HERE, AND ONLY 2 HAVE BEEN TRANSLATED. HIS STUFF IS REALLY GOOD, SO WHY WON'T YOU TRANSLATE IT ALREADY ? SOME OF THESE HAVE BEEN HERE FOR A LONG TIME NOW. Sorry, I went into a bit of a rant there xd.
